name: MobileAppz
description:
MobileAppz is one of the top mobile app development company based in India. We offer mobile application development service across a wide array of platforms like iPhone, Android & web apps. We are a team of 40+ software developers at our Offshore Development Center, in India carefully build by handpicking some of the best technical brains.
We have an enviable delivery record of over 350+ mobile applications that has enabled us to become technology partner’s for software development houses worldwide. Achieved total financial stability since inception and have grown solely based on internally generated funds. Consistent record of over 70% business coming from repeat customers speaks for the quality of our deliverable.
At MobileAppz, we offer following services:-
iPhone App Development
Android App Development
Mobile App Marketing
Mobile App Prototyping
